short_summary: Heavy construction services for Banff East Gate Water Treatment Project
description: Heavy construction services for the Banff East Gate Water Treatment project, including but not limited to the supply and installation of water treatment equipment, associated piping, and electrical/instrumentation. The project is a two-stage process; Stage 1 consists of an invitation to qualify (ITQ), while Stage 2 involves the submission of a financial bid. The contractor must submit their application for the project before the tender closing date.
tags: Banff East Gate Water Treatment Project
